page.title: 18STREET GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: We have decided to describe just 2 of the 53 games we at first listed. { {KERBY}is played by 2 people standing on opposite sides of a road. One throws the ball and if it hits the kerb and bounces back he scores a point. He then gets another turn. If he misses the kerb the other player gets the ball. {ELASTICS - TRIANGLESIE is a jumping game using three elastic bands tied together. 3{enders}form a triangle with the bands. At least 2 {jumpers}are needed. The bands are jumped in 3 ways:{gallop}(large steps) {jump}and{hop.} In the first round the jumper lands between the bands. The second time she lands on the bands. The height of the bands is increased from ankle height to waist height. When a jumper fails, she becomes an ender.
